titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ, 3. Ianuar. 1641 [i.e. 1642]. It is this day ordered upon the question, by the Commons House of Parliament; that if any persons whatsoever, shall come to the lodgings of any member of this house ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Bates in the old Bailie.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
